sourcesContent:
Peliculas

  • {{peli.title}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Peliculas } from '../peliculas'; import { ImdbService } from '../imdb.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-peliculas', templateUrl: './peliculas.component.html', styleUrls: ['./peliculas.component.css'] }) export class PeliculasComponent { public peliculas : any; constructor(private _service: ImdbService ){ } mostrarPelis(): void{ let input: any = document.getElementById('buscador'); let url: string = "https://imdb-api.com/en/API/SearchMovie/k_28i8k3sj/" + input.value; this._service.getPeliculas(url).subscribe(peliculas => this.peliculas = peliculas); } }
